name: Lose a Letter Lexicon Ladder Part 9 Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's a playing tip - If you can't solve the first clue go to one of the others that you can solve, and then work up and down from there.

First word of seven letters-

Definite.

Now drop one letter from the previous answer and rearrange the remaining letters to make the new word of six letters-

A hypnotic state.

Third word of five letters-

A machine for hoisting heavy objects.

Fourth word of four letters-

An eruption of pimples.

Fifth word of three letters-

Sealed metal food container.

New word of seven letters-

Glossy, transparent paint.

Second word of six letters-

To seize and carry away by force, to violate.

Third word of five letters-

Grows on human scalp.

Fourth word of four letters-

Garment worn by women in India and Pakistan.

Fifth word of three letters-

Title of a knight or baronet in the UK.
